typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MaximumAge as string,
		Description as string,
		Title as string,
		URL as string,
		Gender as string,
		FileName as string,
		NCTID as string,
		Summary as string,
		OrgStudyId as string,
		Phase as string,
		MyURL as string,
		Date as string,
		HealthyVolunteers as string,
		OverallStatus as string,
		MinimumAge as string,
		Keywords as string,
		StartDate as string,
		OfficialTitle as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		MaximumAge,
		Description,
		Title,
		URL,
		Gender,
		FileName,
		NCTID,
		Summary,
		OrgStudyId,
		Phase,
		MyURL,
		Date,
		HealthyVolunteers,
		OverallStatus,
		MinimumAge,
		Keywords,
		StartDate,
		OfficialTitle
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selection
selection sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
